name: Medcare Equipment Company, LLC
specialty: Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies, Oxygen Equipment & Supplies

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Medcare Equipment Company, LLC is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies, Oxygen Equipment & Supplies provider based in Export, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $79.3M in Medicaid payments across 1.5M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $79.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
